content: CoveragePlans that an organization sponsors might only be available to that organization's members and proprietary to the sponsoring organization and the Payer. With the shopping experience for Formulary APIs, are we required to show group plans? In case we are required to show group plans for shopping, which search parameter would restrict the search to a particular organization?
Hi @Mark Neumuth . By "required" do you mean by the CMS rule(s)?

Hello @Saul Kravitz . Correct...does CMS require that payers provide members with group plan information? I don't believe so based on last Friday's PDex call but would like to confirm. Thank you! @Raj Sankuratri @Courtney Bland
The shopping experience is not covered by CMS rules.
